item.title: Topic 1 SQL Practice
Important Topic Project
item.description: PUT is idempotent: calling it once or several times successively has the same effect (that is no side effect), whereas successive identical POST requests may have additional effects. PUT is restricted to create or update operations, while a POST operation may perform any type of processing. PUT request creates a resource the server will respond with a 201 ( Created ) In the application.yml file we need to add the username and password and the db name and schema.
